uvi.product_version: versions from v3.3 to before v5.4.134
uvi.description:
memory: fsl_ifc: fix leak of private memory on probe failure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.134 by commit 443f6ca6fd186b4fa4e6f377b6e19a91feb1a0d5, it was introduced in version v3.3 by commit a20cbdeffce247a2b6fb83cd8d22433994068565. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: memory: fsl_ifc: fix leak of private memory on probe failure
